title: Bloomberg's Singh on Qlik: More Consolidation to Come (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Singh on Qlik: More Consolidation to Come (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Mandeep Singh, Software Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, on Qlik being acquired by Thoma Bravo for $30.50 per share, and consolidation trends in the space.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
